summary: The implementation successfully addresses all five requirements. All six routes are properly defined with dynamic parameter support, a responsive Navbar with logo and mobile menu is implemented, the branding color scheme with gradient button component is established, a Footer with required content is created, and a Hero Section with the exact specified text and CTA button is present. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added caffeine.ai attribution link in Footer with UTM tracking parameters
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specified 'placeholder links/icons for YouTube and Telegram social channels' but did not request any attribution or third-party branding links

hallucinated_features.description: Added Heart icon from lucide-react in Footer attribution section
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not specify any heart icon or additional decorative elements beyond the required copyright, COEPian Initiative text, and social placeholders

hallucinated_features.description: Backend file (main.mo) was created despite backend being in non-goals
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Backend implementation or data persistence' as non-goals, yet a backend/main.mo file was added
